SELECT COST.CostCenterID AS "CostCenterID" , COST.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CompanyCode',COST.CompanyCode,#{companyCode}) AS "CompanyName" , COST.CostCenterType AS "CostCenterType" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CostCenterGubun',COST.CostCenterType,#{companyCode}) AS "CostCenterTypeName" , COST.CostCenterCode AS "CostCenterCode" , COST.CostCenterName AS "CostCenterName" , ( CASE WHEN NVL(NULLIF(TO_CHAR(COST.UsePeriodStart),''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COST.UsePeriodStart),'YYYY.MM.DD') END|| ' ~ '|| CASE WHEN NVL(NULLIF(TO_CHAR(COST.UsePeriodFinish),''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COST.UsePeriodFinish),'YYYY.MM.DD') END) AS "UsePeriod" , COST.IsUse AS "IsUse" , COST.RegisterID AS "RegisterID" , USR.DisplayName AS "RegisterName" , CASE WHEN NVL(NULLIF(TO_CHAR(COST.RegistDate),''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COST.RegistDate),'YYYY.MM.DD') END AS "RegistDate" FROM act_cost_center COST LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user USR ON COST.RegisterID = USR.UserCode WHERE 1=1
AND COST.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND ( COST.CostCenterCode LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%' OR COST.CostCenterName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%' )
AND COST.CostCenterName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%'
AND COST.CostCenterCode LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%'
,CostCenterCode DESC

SELECT NULL AS "CostCenterID" , NULL AS "CostCenterType" , ('C'|| CASE WHEN COUNT(CostCenterID) > 0 THEN LPAD(MAX(CostCenterID) + 1,6,0) ELSE LPAD(COUNT(CostCenterID) + 1,6,0) END) AS "CostCenterCode" , NULL AS "CostCenterName" , NULL AS "NameCode" , NULL AS "IsUse" , NULL AS "UsePeriodStart" , NULL AS "UsePeriodFinish" , NULL AS "IsPermanent" , NULL AS "Description" , NULL AS "CompanyCode" , NULL AS "companyCodeTxt" , NULL AS "costCenterTypeTxt" FROM act_cost_center

SELECT COST.CostCenterID AS "CostCenterID" , COST.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , COST.CostCenterType AS "CostCenterType" , COST.CostCenterCode AS "CostCenterCode" , COST.CostCenterName AS "CostCenterName" , COST.NameCode AS "NameCode" , COST.IsUse AS "IsUse" , CASE WHEN NVL(NULLIF(TO_CHAR(COST.UsePeriodStart),''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COST.UsePeriodStart),'YYYY.MM.DD') END AS "UsePeriodStart" , CASE WHEN NVL(NULLIF(TO_CHAR(COST.UsePeriodFinish),''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COST.UsePeriodFinish),'YYYY.MM.DD') END AS "UsePeriodFinish" , COST.IsPermanent AS "IsPermanent" , COST.Description AS "Description" , COST.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CompanyCode', COST.CompanyCode, #{companyCode}) AS "companyCodeTxt" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CostCenterGubun', COST.CostCenterType, #{companyCode}) AS "costCenterTypeTxt" FROM act_cost_center COST WHERE CostCenterID = #{costCenterID}

SELECT 'group' AS "itemType" , gr.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , gr.GroupCode AS "GroupCode" , gr.GroupType AS "GroupType" , gr.MultiDisplayName AS "GroupName" , cn.MultiDisplayName AS "CompanyName" , gr.PrimaryMail AS "PrimaryMail" , gr.MemberOf AS "MemberOf" , gr.GroupCode AS "AN" , gr.MultiDisplayName AS "DN" , gr.PrimaryMail AS "EM" , cn.CompanyCode AS "ETID" , cn.MultiDisplayName AS "ETNM" , gr.MemberOf AS "SGAN" , gr.MemberOf AS "SGDN" , gr.Receivable AS "RCV" , gr.SortPath AS "SortPath" , gr.GroupPath AS "GroupPath" , gr.GroupID AS "GroupID" , ( SELECT COUNT(0) FROM sys_object_group self WHERE self.MemberOf = gr.GroupCode AND self.IsUse = 'Y') AS "hasChild" , REPLACE(sys_getFullPath(gr.GroupCode,#{lang}),'@','>') AS "GroupFullPath"
FROM sys_object_group gr LEFT JOIN sys_object_group cn ON gr.CompanyCode = cn.GroupCode AND cn.GroupType = 'Company' WHERE gr.IsUse = 'Y' AND gr.IsDisplay = 'Y'
AND gr.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUSE' OR gr.MemberOf IS NULL) AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUNIT' OR gr.MemberOf IS NULL) AND gr.GroupType IN ('Dept','Company') ORDER BY gr.SortPath ASC
